sys_ui_script.description: This script is to hide the sections when the intial load happens.
sys_ui_script.name: x_1645406_distribu.Hide Sections on inti

sys_update_version.name: sys_ui_script_2a94291e83032210671b33d6feaad330
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_script"><sys_ui_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>This script is to hide the sections when the intial load happens.</description><global>false</global><ignore_in_now_experience>false</ignore_in_now_experience><name>x_1645406_distribu.Hide Sections on inti</name><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
    // Get all sections
    let sections = g_form.getSections();

    // Hide all sections
    for (var i = 0; i < sections.length; i++) {
        g_form.setSectionDisplay(sections[i], false);
    }

    // Show the options section (replace with the correct section name or ID)
    g_form.setSectionDisplay('please_selectoneoftheoptionsbelow', true); 

    // Show the first annotation section (replace with the correct section name or ID)
    g_form.setSectionDisplay('distribution_listmanagement', true); 
}
]]></script><script_name>Hide Sections on intial load</script_name><sys_class_name>sys_ui_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-08-01 07:12:46</sys_created_on><sys_id>2a94291e83032210671b33d6feaad330</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>x_1645406_distribu.Hide Sections on inti</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Distribution List" source="x_1645406_distribu">97ce3c4683c32210671b33d6feaad36f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Distribution List">97ce3c4683c32210671b33d6feaad36f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_script_2a94291e83032210671b33d6feaad330</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-08-01 07:12:46</sys_updated_on><ui_type>10</ui_type><use_scoped_format>false</use_scoped_format></sys_ui_script></record_update>
